unnormalised: Hey guys, any news on Jadeja's knee? Hope he recovers soon. Remember that 2013 Champions Trophy? Sigh... Saw reports on Bumrah too. Manipal Hospital says 6 weeks? That's ages! Heard Rohan got sidelined after the kabaddi match at IIT Delhi. Wishing him a DDLJ style recovery! Fingers crossed for everyone's speedy return to the field!
normalised: Hey guys, any news on Jadeja's knee? Hope he recovers soon. Remember that two thousand and thirteen Champions Trophy? Sigh... Saw reports on Bumrah too. Manipal Hospital says six weeks? That's ages! Heard Rohan got sidelined after the kabaddi match at I I T Delhi. Wishing him a D D L J style recovery! Fingers crossed for everyone's speedy return to the field!
